page.title: 18Hexworthy Hamlet
page.content: Hexworthy is a hamlet where only 10 people live. There are 4 houses including Greystone Farm whose buildings are over 400 years old.The farm is about 250 acres in size and they have a dairy herd of 150 cows and a battery hen house which has 30,000 chickens which are kept just for eggs.The farm employs 5 full time and 10 part time helpers.One of the other houses is a smallholding called Little Hexworthy. This is mainly used for grazing horses. Hexworthy has no amenities only a post box.5 children live in Hexworthy and they have to come to school in Launceston 5 miles away.To go to the shops people also have to come into Launceston and since there are no buses or taxis, private transport is essential.
